comments.html:
I use python with EVE-NG for this purpose. I simply create a Lab, configure the IP addressing , save the config with the script. This is the skeleton.

Then I put IGP /BGP and my skeleton gets shape.

Later I cone the lab, I push the saved config via the script, and I can start learning different topic like epvn/vpls etc, my core is ready no need to reconfigure again everything
comments.name: Alin Bandiu
